renderacontroller.name: Rendera Controller
renderacontroller.description: Control Rendera 3D rendering engine from Construct 3.

model-name.name: Model name
model-name.desc: Name of the 3D model to use when this instance is placed in the editor.

debug-rendering.name: Debug rendering
debug-rendering.desc: Enable debug rendering overlay to show model and system information.

is-large-number.description: Test if a number is greater than 100.

number.name: Number
number.desc: Number to test if greater than 100.

is-animation-playing.description: Check if a specific animation is currently playing.

animation-name.name: Animation name
animation-name.desc: Name of the animation to check if playing.

is-any-animation-playing.description: Check if any animation is currently playing, regardless of name.

on-model-created.description: Triggered when a 3D model has been successfully created and is ready to use.

on-animation-finished.description: Triggered when a non-looping animation completes playing.

on-animation-loop.description: Triggered when a looping animation completes one loop cycle.

on-animation-start.description: Triggered when an animation begins playing.

on-animation-stop.description: Triggered when an animation is manually stopped.

create-model.description: Create a 3D model instance from a file path.

play-animation.description: Play an animation on the current model with optional blending.

animation-name.name: Animation name
animation-name.desc: Name of the animation to play.

blend-duration.name: Blend duration
blend-duration.desc: Time in seconds to blend from current animation (0 for instant switch).

set-animation-speed.description: Set the playback speed of the current animation (0.1 to 10).

speed.name: Speed
speed.desc: The animation playback speed multiplier (0.1 = 10% speed, 1 = normal, 2 = double speed, max 10).

set-debug-rendering.description: Enable or disable debug rendering overlay.

set-scale.description: Set the uniform scale of the current model.

scale.name: Scale
scale.desc: The scale factor to apply to all axes.

set-scale-xyz.display-text: Set scale to X:[i]{0}[/i] Y:[i]{1}[/i] Z:[i]{2}[/i]
set-scale-xyz.description: Set the scale of the current model independently for each axis.

scale-x.name: Scale X
scale-x.desc: The scale factor for the X axis.

scale-y.name: Scale Y
scale-y.desc: The scale factor for the Y axis.

scale-z.name: Scale Z
scale-z.desc: The scale factor for the Z axis.

set-sprite-visible.description: Show or hide the 2D sprite overlay.

set-position.description: Set the 3D position of the current model.

set-rotation.description: Set the rotation of the current model using Euler angles in degrees with specified rotation order.

x.name: X rotation
x.desc: The rotation around the X axis in degrees.

y.name: Y rotation
y.desc: The rotation around the Y axis in degrees.

z.name: Z rotation
z.desc: The rotation around the Z axis in degrees.

order.name: Rotation order
order.desc: The order in which rotations are applied (e.g., XYZ means rotate X first, then Y, then Z).

enable-all-nodes.description: Enable rendering for all nodes in the current model.

disable-all-nodes.description: Disable rendering for all nodes in the current model.

enable-node.description: Enable rendering for a specific node by name.

node-name.name: Node name
node-name.desc: The name of the node to enable.

disable-node.description: Disable rendering for a specific node by name.

node-name.name: Node name
node-name.desc: The name of the node to disable.

animation-speed.description: Get the current animation speed multiplier.

scale-x.description: Get the current X axis scale factor.

scale-y.description: Get the current Y axis scale factor.

scale-z.description: Get the current Z axis scale factor.

last-finished-animation.description: Get the name of the last animation that finished playing.
